name: Trial Balance Report
query: SELECT  `tabGeneral Ledger`.account as "Account:Data/Account:150",  `tabGeneral Ledger`.credit as "Credit:Data/Credit:150",  `tabGeneral Ledger`.debit as "Debit:Data/Debit:150",  `tabGeneral Ledger`.against_account as "Against Account:Data/Against Account:150",  `tabGeneral Ledger`.voucher_type as "Voucher type:Data/Voucher Type:150",  `tabGeneral Ledger`.fiscal_year as "Fiscal Year:Data/Fiscal Year:150",  `tabGeneral Ledger`.transaction_date as "Transaction Date:Datetime/Transaction Date:150",    `tabGeneral Ledger`.balance as "Balance:Data/Balance:150"  FROM `tabGeneral Ledger`
